text: 10.19: Kis 20.12-16; Lo 5.16-20; 24.14; Ze 5.4Ndu Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨvi kaŋgi. Ndu guma shogiri ana rɨmɨ thari, ndu hara guma muuŋ ruarir ana ndi thari, ndu kɨmɨ thari. Ndu bigi shɨshɨgɨ thari, ndu fhura gumgi nɨfhɨ sɨv mbe bigi ndi thari. Ndu wo ndia gu niamuuŋ piin kɨv mani buni mbararari.”
